text:
Figure 22.5: Histograms of the body acceleration data for 10 subjects.
Finally, a ﬁgure is generated summarizing the distribution the gyroscopic data for the ﬁrst
10 subjects. We see a high likelihood of a Gaussian distribution for each axis across each
subject centered on 0.0. The distributions are a little wider and show fatter tails, but this is an
encouraging ﬁnding for modeling movement data across subjects.
